Digital products derisked.

I'm Mike Carter, I lead development on digital products with solid foundations, room to scale, and costs under control.

I’ve worked with...

How I can help

Experience and expertise

Software is a booming industry, but it can be hard to find seasoned experts among the rush of newcomers.

With 17 years under my belt, I’ve focused my career on developing robust, scaleable web applications that deliver real value for businesses in multiple sectors, and on multiple continents.

I know my technical fundamentals from my higher level frameworks, and make it my business to keep up to date with the latest technologies and best practices.

Clear, pragmatic leadership

Strong communication and strategic thinking skills are a superpower for software engineers.

I use clear written, verbal and visual communication to achieve a shared understanding between technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Where stategic decisions need to be made, I’ll prioritise your business objectives alongside team strengths and weaknesses, and guide everyone to a well considered development plan.

Removing risk and uncertainty

Done poorly, developing digital products can be expensive, slow, and offer little return on investment.

I derisk digital product development by keeping solutions simple, scaleable, and complimentary to your development team’s current skillsets.

This avoids common pitfalls and long-term maintenance costs, resulting in products that are cost effective, delivered promptly, and provide a top return on investment.

Delivering results

Getting decisions made and work completed in a dynamic business environment can be tough.

I work efficiently by understanding the needs of different stakeholders, systematically eliminating concerns, and making it easy for people to say “yes”.

This removes friction between stakeholders, delivers results quickly, and helps to keep everyone invested in the digital product development process.

Testimonials

My services

Development consultancy

If you’re looking to build something new, or would like long-term technical help, I can help guide decision making.

I’ll work closely with you to deliver top quality digital products using the best technology for the job. I’ll speak a language you understand, and keep your return on investment front of mind.

By continuously re-assessing the needs and constraints in your business, I’ll ensure your development team or agency continue smoothly towards their goal as new issues and blockers are uncovered, and keep you informed of progress along the way.

Product development

For a fixed price or daily rate, I’ll work on your digital product directly, helping you to achieve a clear return on investment for your business.

I’ll coordinate with stakeholders to establish clear requirements, and then deliver expertly crafted software that fully realises your vision for launch with solid foundations for further development and scaling.

All of my work is carefully documented, and uses technologies with a proven track record and promising trajectory in order to ensure you’re able to continue to find talented developers to grow your product long into the future.

FAQs

What languages do you work with?

I primarily work with JavaScript, Ruby and their popular frameworks (React, Express, Rails, etc). Naturally my HTML and CSS are strong too.

Can you charge a fixed price?

Yes. I prefer to charge a fixed price for projects, because my clients prefer price certainty. I invoice on a 50% up-front, 50% prior to go-live basis.

What’s your day rate?

Where a fixed cost is not practical or desired, I charge a rate of £800 per day. At the end of each month I’ll issue an invoice for days worked.

Do you offer ongoing support?

My work comes with 30 days of complimentary bug fixes and support from the point it goes live. Outside of this, support can be negotiated on a per-engagement basis.

Will you work with our developers?

Yes, I love to work with other developers. Collaboration is great for quality software, it allows me to share best practices your business can benefit from after I’m gone.

What if our plans change?

In the event of a change of plans, we can negotiate something new or cancel the project completely. Cancellations will mean no deliverables from me, and no 50% final payment for you.

Will you come to our offices?

Yes. I primarily work remotely, but I’m happy to be with you in-person when it makes sense to do so. This can be factored into the scope of your project, or billed for at my hourly rate.

What if we need more people?

I have a wide network of skilled developers, designers, and project managers I’ve worked with previously. If necessary, I can pull in the right people to keep things running smoothly.

Do you have availability?

I’m currently booked until May 2023. I’m often booked out several months ahead, so if you’re planning something, contact me early to avoid disappointment.

Contact

Drop me an email you’re interested in working with me, have a question, or just want to say hi.

I’m currently available from May 2023 onwards. Looking forward to hearing from you!
